attributes.action: Universities to remain open or tuitions be refunded in full!

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

There is already a petition calling for universities to be required to reimburse students their tuition fees during strike action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300528

If you want to start a petition calling for a different action you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
